org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph

Class DefaultLengthCosts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.DefaultLengthCosts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Costs

    public class DefaultLengthCosts
extends java.lang.Object
implements Costs
    A default AStar cost implementation, that uses the generic arc length as a cost.

    Notice that the heuristic always returns 0, what makes AStar much slower.

    However, this class exists to provide default costs for arc or nodes that are not geo-localized. DistanceCosts or an other AStart costs implementation should be used whenever its possible.
